long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Effortlessly export tweets from a Twitter user with one-click. Seamlessly download and archive tweets for social media analysis, comprehensive reporting, personal records, or digital marketing strategies. Our tool provides an easy and efficient way to export Twitter data, ensuring you never lose important tweets. Try our Twitter export feature today and simplify your social media data management.

âš™ï¸ Get Started
1.Enter Username.
2.Choose export type.
3.Click the 'Export' button.

ğŸ’¡ Features
âœ“ Export posts from a twitter user to XLSX/CSV.
âœ“ Export replies from a twitter user to XLSX/CSV.
âœ“ Export data including id, text, tweet_url, language, type, author_name, author_username, view_count, bookmark_count, favorite_count, retweet_count, reply_count, quote_count, created_at, source, hashtags, urls, media_type, media_urls.

ğŸ”’ Data Privacy
Your data privacy is paramount. All data processing occurs on your local machine; it never transits through our servers, ensuring no one else has access to your collected data.

ğŸ‘‹ Contact
For support or inquiries, reach out to us at lazytechofficial@gmail.com

Esporta senza sforzo i tweet di un utente di Twitter con un solo clic. Scarica e archivia senza problemi i tweet per analisi sui social media, report completi, record personali o strategie di marketing digitale. Il nostro strumento offre un modo facile ed efficiente per esportare dati di Twitter, garantendoti di non perdere mai tweet importanti. Prova oggi stesso la nostra funzione di esportazione di Twitter e semplifica la gestione dei tuoi dati sui social media.
